item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Tuesday, October 29, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. One weird trick to get the whole planet to send abuse complaints to your best friend(s) (58 points | 10 comments)
2. How we shrunk our Javascript monorepo git size by 94% (17 points | 6 comments)
3. A free and open source map of the world, deployable as a single static file (70 points | 7 comments)
4. You can now run prompts against images, audio and video in your terminal using LLM (7 points | no comments)
5. Jia Tanning Go code (85 points | 11 comments)
6. Un-Deprecate : my plea to the w3c (2 points | 2 comments)
7. RTP: One protocol to rule them all (21 points | 41 comments)
8. eBPF: Unlocking the Kernel [OFFICIAL DOCUMENTARY] (11 points | 3 comments)
9. We're forking Flutter. This is why (31 points | 11 comments)
10. Working with stacked branches in Git is easier with --update-refs (30 points | 8 comments)
11. Local web-based notes app inspired by "One Big Text File" with webpage downloads (24 points | 10 comments)
12. Avoiding accidental downgrade of 2FA (5 points | 1 comment)
13. FOSDEM 2025 - Presentations - Call for Participation (6 points | no comments)
14. Using CTID Based Pagination for Data Cleanups in PostgreSQL (3 points | 5 comments)
15. Ransomware for Haiku (4 points | no comments)
16. How I write code using Cursor: A review (7 points | no comments)
17. Operate Android Device on FreeBSD (10 points | 1 comment)
18. Specifying serializability in TLA+ (9 points | 1 comment)
19. Migrating billions of records: moving our active DNS database while it’s in use (3 points | 1 comment)
20. For Sale: Used Domain (**Clean Title**) (22 points | 11 comments)
21. Don’t Implement Unification by Recursion (30 points | 2 comments)
22. Bootloader Unlock Wall of Shame (49 points | 6 comments)
23. Ancient Monkey: Pwning a 17-Year-Old Version of SpiderMonkey (3 points | no comments)
24. SQLite rsync: Database Remote-Copy Tool For SQLite (64 points | 9 comments)
25. PEP 750 – Template Strings: lazy string formatting evaluation (23 points | 20 comments)
